response.overview: "Metamorphosis" is a short documentary film created by young people from Orocovis, Puerto Rico, as part of the "Documenting Memory" workshop, a program of the Puerto Rico Documentary Filmmakers Association (ADocPR) and the Ana Dalila Burgos Foundation that uses documentary film to transform rural communities, showing the resilience of the people in turning an abandoned school into a vibrant community center after Hurricane Maria.
response.title: Metamorfosis

crew.name: Jóvenes del Taller Documentar La Memoria
crew.original_name: Jóvenes del Taller Documentar La Memoria
